select top 1 a.hthm+'|'+a.yhrq+'|'+c.realname as fileName, replace(webaddress,'ftp://192.168.3.2','http://os.nbhooya.com/quality') as path, e.country as country from Qc_Report a inner join cght d on a.hthm=d.hthm inner join scb_khmc e on d.khmc=e.khmc left join Qc_picture b on a.number=b.father left join Qc_User c on a.yhry=c.name

#{item}
